AUTHOR: Hexexpeck
DESCRIPTION: A cog made by Hexexpeck that lets you talk as your bot using your bot's console.
INSTALL_MSG: Thank you for installing my Chatter cog. This cog is for the bot owner only. Console commands are `~~exit` to exit the console talk mode and `~~switch` to switch channels. **This is in beta so crashes may occur, report them and any other issues on the Hex-Cogs GitHub repository <https://github.com/Hexexpeck/Hex-Cogs> or tag Hexexpeck#8781 in Red's Discord server.**
NAME: Chatter
SHORT: Chat as your bot using your bot console
